CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "Magic Surrounds Girl Friends' Pittsburgh Meet - The Philadelphia group had itself a merry time at the dinner-dance. This is the chapter which sponsored the Pittsburgh GFs.  Here are the Jack Smiths, the Waddie Beltons, the William Youngs, the Howard Towneses, the George Coverdales, the Franklyn Norrises, the Harrison Hobsons and Montrose Hilton"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Philadelphia visitors include: Mr. and Mrs. Jack Smith, Mr. and Mrs. Waddie Belton, Mr. and Mrs. William Young, Mr. and Mrs. Howard Townes, Mr. and Mrs. George Coverdales, Mr. and Mrs. Franklyn Norris, Mr. and Mrs. Harrison Hobson, and Montrose Hilton, gathered in Webster Hall with landscape mural for Thirtieth Anniversary Convention of Girl Friends, Inc.
